p: The 13th Sustainable Development Goal (SDG) among the 17 ambitious and challenging SDGs adopted by the UN member states is “(to) take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts” [ 1]. In fact, the 13th SDG is directly and or indirectly linked with the other 16 SDGs. Therefore, it was necessary for the international community to take urgent action to mitigate climate change in order to facilitate unprecedented reductions in greenhouse gas emissions.
